entity.name: DataSet de test
entity.query: SELECT "fuse_prg_id".prop_id as prop_id, "fuse_prg_id".cycle as cycle, "fuse_prg_id".title as title, "fuse_prg_id".fname as fname, "fuse_prg_id".lname as lname, "fuse_prg_id".institution as institution, "fuse_prg_id".abstract as abstract FROM fuse."fuse_prg_id" WHERE 1=1
